nodeproperties.name: description
nodeproperties.description: Human readable description of the VDU

nodeproperties.name: sw_image_data
nodeproperties.description: Defines information related to a SwImage artifact used by this Vdu.Compute node

nodeproperties.name: boot_order
nodeproperties.description: indicates whether the order of the virtual_storage requirements is used as the boot index (the first requirement represents the lowest index and defines highest boot priority)

nodeproperties.name: boot_data
nodeproperties.description: Contains the information used to customize a virtualised compute resource at boot time. The bootData may contain variable parts that are replaced by deployment specific values before being sent to the VIM.

nodeproperties.name: nfvi_constraints
nodeproperties.description: Describes constraints on the NFVI for the VNFC instance(s) created from this VDU. This property is reserved for future use in the present document.

nodeproperties.name: monitoring_parameters
nodeproperties.description: Describes monitoring parameters applicable to a VNFC instantiated from this VDU

nodeproperties.name: vdu_profile
nodeproperties.description: Defines additional instantiation data for the VDU.Compute node

nodeproperties.name: name
nodeproperties.description: Human readable name of the VDU

nodeattributes.name: state
nodeattributes.description: The state of the node instance.

nodeattributes.name: tosca_id
nodeattributes.description: A unique identifier of the realized instance of a Node Template that derives from any TOSCA normative type.

nodeattributes.name: tosca_name
nodeattributes.description: This attribute reflects the name of the Node Template as defined in the TOSCA service template. This name is not unique to the realized instance model of corresponding deployed application as each template in the model can result in one or more instances (e.g., scaled) when orchestrated to a provider environment.

capabilityproperties.name: virtual_cpu
capabilityproperties.description: Describes virtual CPU(s) of the virtualized compute

capabilityproperties.name: logical_node
capabilityproperties.description: Describes the Logical Node requirements

capabilityproperties.name: virtual_local_storage
capabilityproperties.description: A list of virtual system disks created and destroyed as part of the VM lifecycle

capabilityproperties.name: requested_additional_capabilities
capabilityproperties.description: Describes additional capability for a particular VDU

capabilityproperties.name: virtual_memory
capabilityproperties.description: Describes virtual memory of the virtualized compute

nodeproperties.name: descriptor_id
nodeproperties.description: Identifier of this VNFD information element. This attribute shall be globally unique

nodeproperties.name: product_info_name
nodeproperties.description: Human readable name for the VNF Product

nodeproperties.name: provider
nodeproperties.description: Provider of the VNF and of the VNFD

nodeproperties.name: software_version
nodeproperties.description: Software version of the VNF

nodeproperties.name: default_localization_language
nodeproperties.description: Default localization language that is instantiated if no information about selected localization language is available

nodeproperties.name: flavour_id
nodeproperties.description: Identifier of the Deployment Flavour within the VNFD

nodeproperties.name: vnf_profile
nodeproperties.description: Describes a profile for instantiating VNFs of a particular NS DF according to a specific VNFD and VNF DF

nodeproperties.name: localization_languages
nodeproperties.description: Information about localization languages of the VNF

nodeproperties.name: flavour_description
nodeproperties.description: Human readable description of the DF

nodeproperties.name: descriptor_version
nodeproperties.description: Identifies the version of the VNFD

nodeproperties.name: product_info_description
nodeproperties.description: Human readable description of the VNF Product

nodeproperties.name: monitoring_parameters
nodeproperties.description: Describes monitoring parameters applicable to the VNF.

nodeproperties.name: lcm_operations_configuration
nodeproperties.description: Describes the configuration parameters for the VNF LCM operations

nodeproperties.name: vnfm_info
nodeproperties.description: Identifies VNFM(s) compatible with the VNF

nodeproperties.name: product_name
nodeproperties.description: Human readable name for the VNF Product

nodeattributes.name: state
nodeattributes.description: The state of the node instance.

nodeattributes.name: tosca_id
nodeattributes.description: A unique identifier of the realized instance of a Node Template that derives from any TOSCA normative type.

nodeattributes.name: tosca_name
nodeattributes.description: This attribute reflects the name of the Node Template as defined in the TOSCA service template. This name is not unique to the realized instance model of corresponding deployed application as each template in the model can result in one or more instances (e.g., scaled) when orchestrated to a provider environment.

nodeattributes.name: scale_status
nodeattributes.description: Scale status of the VNF, one entry per aspect. Represents for every scaling aspect how "big" the VNF has been scaled w.r.t. that aspect.

artifacts.name: software_images
artifacts.description: Location of the software images being used in this package

properties.name: operating_system
properties.description: Identifies the operating system used in the software image

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this software image

properties.name: container_format
properties.description: The container format describes the container file format in which software image is provided

properties.name: min_ram
properties.description: The minimal RAM requirement for this software image

properties.name: disk_format
properties.description: The disk format of a software image is the format of the underlying disk image

properties.name: supported_virtualisation_environments
properties.description: Identifies the virtualisation environments (e.g. hypervisor) compatible with this software image

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version of this software image

properties.name: provider
properties.description: Provider of this software image

properties.name: min_disk
properties.description: The minimal disk size requirement for this software image

properties.name: checksum
properties.description: Checksum of the software image file

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of this software image

artifacts.name: scaling_mapping
artifacts.description: Scaling Mapping file associated with this descriptor

inputs.name: vnfc_instance_ids
inputs.description: List of VNFC instances requiring a healing action.

inputs.name: cause
inputs.description: Indicates the reason why a healing procedure is required.

inputs.name: scale_info
inputs.description: For each scaling aspect of the current deployment flavour, indicates the target scale level to which the VNF is to be scaled. Either instantiation_level or scale_info shall be provided.

inputs.name: instantiation_level
inputs.description: Identifier of the target instantiation level of the current deployment flavour to which the VNF is requested to be scaled. Either instantiation_level or scale_info shall be provided.

value.helm_package2: crd_package3: rollback, helm_package2: delete_pvc, helm_package1: upgrade, helm_package2: install

raw_value.helm_package2: crd_package3: rollback, helm_package2: delete_pvc, helm_package1: upgrade, helm_package2: install

inputs.name: rollback_pattern
inputs.description: pattern to apply when for downgrade

value.helm_package2: crd_package3: rollback, helm_package2: delete_pvc[component=server], helm_package1: upgrade, helm_package2: install

raw_value.helm_package2: crd_package3: rollback, helm_package2: delete_pvc[component=server], helm_package1: upgrade, helm_package2: install

properties.name: deltas
properties.description: Describes the Vdu.Compute scaling deltas to be applied for every scaling steps of a particular aspect.

properties.name: aspect
properties.description: Represents the scaling aspect to which this policy applies

properties.name: levels
properties.description: Describes the Vdu.Compute levels of resources that can be used to instantiate the VNF using this flavour

properties.name: deltas
properties.description: Describes the Vdu.Compute scaling deltas to be applied for every scaling steps of a particular aspect.

properties.name: aspect
properties.description: Represents the scaling aspect to which this policy applies

properties.name: default_level
properties.description: The default instantiation level for this flavour.

properties.name: levels
properties.description: Describes the various levels of resources that can be used to instantiate the VNF using this flavour.

properties.name: deltas
properties.description: Describes the Vdu.Compute scaling deltas to be applied for every scaling steps of a particular aspect.

properties.name: aspect
properties.description: Represents the scaling aspect to which this policy applies

properties.name: initial_delta
properties.description: Represents the initial minimum size of the VNF.

properties.name: destination_flavour_id
properties.description: Identifies the deployment flavour in the destination VNF package for which this change applies. The flavour ID is defined in the destination VNF package.

properties.name: modification_qualifier
properties.description: Specifies the type of modification resulting from transitioning from srcVnfdId to dstVnfdId. The possible values are UP indicating that the destination VNF version is newer than the source version, DOWN indicating that the destination VNF version is older than the source version.

properties.name: component_mappings
properties.description: Mapping information related to identifiers of components in source VNFD and destination VNFD that concern to the change process.

properties.name: additional_modification_description
properties.description: Additional information to qualify further the change between the two versions.

properties.name: selector
properties.description: Information to identify the source and destination VNFD for the change, and the related deployment flavours.

properties.name: initial_delta
properties.description: Represents the initial minimum size of the VNF.

properties.name: destination_flavour_id
properties.description: Identifies the deployment flavour in the destination VNF package for which this change applies. The flavour ID is defined in the destination VNF package.

properties.name: modification_qualifier
properties.description: Specifies the type of modification resulting from transitioning from srcVnfdId to dstVnfdId. The possible values are UP indicating that the destination VNF version is newer than the source version, DOWN indicating that the destination VNF version is older than the source version.

properties.name: component_mappings
properties.description: Mapping information related to identifiers of components in source VNFD and destination VNFD that concern to the change process.

properties.name: additional_modification_description
properties.description: Additional information to qualify further the change between the two versions.

properties.name: selector
properties.description: Information to identify the source and destination VNFD for the change, and the related deployment flavours.

properties.name: aspects

Aspect5.description: Scale level 0-12 maps to 3-27 for test-cnf-vnfc5 VNFC instances (2 instance per scale step)
Aspect5.name: Aspect5

Aspect3.description: Scale level 0-12 maps to 3-27 for test-cnf and test-cnf-vnfc1 VNFC instances (2 instance per scale step)
Aspect3.name: Aspect3

Aspect2.description: Scale level 0-7 maps to 5-27 for test-cnf-vnfc3 and test-cnf-vnfc4 VNFC instances (4 instance in first scale level, 1 instance in second scale level, 9 instance in third scale level and 3 instance in all the next scale levels)
Aspect2.name: Aspect2

Aspect1.description: Scale level 0-10 maps to 1-11 for eric-pm-bulk-reporter instances.
Aspect1.name: Aspect1

Aspect5.description: Scale level 0-12 maps to 3-27 for test-cnf-vnfc5 VNFC instances (2 instance per scale step)
Aspect5.name: Aspect5

Aspect3.description: Scale level 0-12 maps to 3-27 for test-cnf and test-cnf-vnfc1 VNFC instances (2 instance per scale step)
Aspect3.name: Aspect3

Aspect2.description: Scale level 0-7 maps to 5-27 for test-cnf-vnfc3 and test-cnf-vnfc4 VNFC instances (4 instance in first scale level, 1 instance in second scale level, 9 instance in third scale level and 3 instance in all the next scale levels)
Aspect2.name: Aspect2

Aspect1.description: Scale level 0-10 maps to 1-11 for eric-pm-bulk-reporter instances.
Aspect1.name: Aspect1

properties.description: Describe maximum scale level for total number of scaling steps that can be applied to a particular aspect

properties.description: Represents the initial minimum size of the VNF.
